00057 /* windows stuff */
00058 int rlwsa()
00059 {
00060 #ifdef RLWIN32
00061   static int first = 1;
00062   WORD    wVersionRequested;
00063   WSADATA wsadata;
00064   int     err;
00065 
00066   if(first == 1)
00067   {
00068 #ifdef IS_OLD_MSVCPP
00069     wVersionRequested = MAKEWORD(1,1);
00070 #else
00071     wVersionRequested = MAKEWORD(2,0);
00072 #endif
00073     err = WSAStartup(wVersionRequested, &wsadata);
00074     if(err != 0)
00075     {
00076       ::printf("Startup error=%d on windows\n",err);
00077       exit(0);
00078     }
00079     first = 0;
00080   }
00081 #endif
00082   return 0;
00083 }
00084 
00085 rlSocket::rlSocket(const char *a, int p, int act)
00086 {
00087   rlwsa(); // init sockets on windows
00088   setAdr(a);
00089   port = p;
00090   active = act;
00091   s = -1;
00092   os = -1;
00093   first = 1;
00094   rl_ipversion = 4;
00095   memset(sockaddr,0,sizeof(sockaddr));
00096 }
00097 
00098 rlSocket::rlSocket(int socket)
00099 {
00100   adr[0] = '\0';
00101   port   = -1;
00102   active = 0;
00103   s      = socket;
00104   os     = -1;
00105   first  = 0;
00106   rl_ipversion = 4;
00107   memset(sockaddr,0,sizeof(sockaddr));
00108 }
00109 
00110 rlSocket::~rlSocket()
00111 {
00112   disconnect();
00113   if(os != -1 && active == 0)
00114   {
00115 #ifdef RLWIN32
00116     closesocket(os);
00117 #else
00118     close(os);
00119 #endif
00120   }
00121 }

00123 void rlSocket::setAdr(const char *a)
00124 {
00125   adr[0] = '\0';
00126   if(a == NULL) return;
00127   if((strlen(a)+1) > sizeof(adr)) return;
00128   strcpy(adr,a);
00129 }

00146 int rlSocket::read(void *buf, int len, int timeout)
00147 {
00148   int  i,ret;
00149   char *cbuf;
00150 
00151   if(s == -1) return -1;
00152   if(select(timeout) == 0) return 0; // timeout
00153 
00154   cbuf = (char *) buf;
00155   i = 0;
00156   while(i < len)
00157   {
00158     ret = recv(s,&cbuf[i],len-i,0);
00159     if(ret <= 0)
00160     {
00161       disconnect();
00162       return -1;
00163     }
00164     i += ret;
00165     if(i < len)
00166     {
00167       if(select(timeout) == 0) return 0; // timeout
00168     }
00169   }
00170 
00171   return i;
00172 }
00173 
00174 int rlSocket::readStr(char *buf, int len, int timeout)
00175 {
00176   int ret,i;
00177 
00178   if(s == -1) return -1;
00179   if(select(timeout) == 0) return 0; // timeout
00180 
00181   i = 0;
00182   while(1)
00183   {
00184 #ifdef RLWIN32
00185 tryagain:
00186 #endif
00187     ret = recv(s,&buf[i],1,0);
00188     if(ret <= 0)
00189     {
00190 #ifdef RLWIN32
00191       if(WSAEWOULDBLOCK == WSAGetLastError()) goto tryagain;
00192 #endif
00193       disconnect();
00194       buf[i] = '\0';
00195       return -1;
00196     }
00197     if(buf[i] == '\n')
00198     {
00199       buf[i+1] = '\0';
00200       return i+1;
00201     }
00202     if(i >= len-1)
00203     {
00204       buf[i+1] = '\0';
00205       return i+1;
00206     }
00207     i++;
00208   }
00209 }
00210 
00211 int rlSocket::write(const void *buf, int len)
00212 {
00213   int ret,bytes_left,first_byte;
00214   const char *cbuf;
00215 
00216   if(s == -1) return -1;
00217   cbuf = (char *) buf;
00218   bytes_left = len;
00219   first_byte = 0;
00220 
00221   while(bytes_left > 0)
00222   {
00223     ret = send(s,&cbuf[first_byte],bytes_left,MSG_NOSIGNAL);
00224     if(ret <= 0)
00225     {
00226       disconnect();
00227       return -1;
00228     }
00229     bytes_left -= ret;
00230     first_byte += ret;
00231   }
00232 
00233   return first_byte;
00234 }
00235 
00236 int rlSocket::connect()
00237 {
00238   int option;
00239   int ret;
00240   socklen_t socklen;
00241   struct sockaddr_in     localAddr;
00242   struct sockaddr_in     remoteAddr;
00243   struct hostent        *host;
00244   struct in_addr         RemoteIpAddress;
00245 #ifdef AF_INET6_IS_AVAILABLE
00246   struct addrinfo        hints0, hints1;
00247   struct addrinfo       *res, *ressave;
00248   int n;
00249   char portstr[32];
00250 #endif
00251 
00252   if(port <= 0)       return PORT_ERR;
00253   if(port >= 256*256) return PORT_ERR;
00254   if(active == 0)
00255   { // accept calls
00256     s = -1;
00257     if(rl_ipversion == 4)
00258     {
00259       if(first == 1)
00260       {
00261         // create a socket
00262         os = socket(AF_INET,SOCK_STREAM,0);
00263         if(os == -1) return SOCKET_ERR;
00264         // set socket options 
00265 #ifdef __VMS
00266         option = 1;
00267         if(setsockopt(os,SOL_SOCKET,SO_KEEPALIVE,&option,sizeof(option)) < 0)
00268         {
00269           return SETSOCKOPT_ERR;
00270         }
00271 #endif
00272         option = 1;
00273 #ifdef RLWIN32
00274         setsockopt(os,SOL_SOCKET,SO_REUSEADDR,(const char *) &option,sizeof(option));
00275 #else
00276         setsockopt(os,SOL_SOCKET,SO_REUSEADDR,&option,sizeof(option));
00277 #endif
00278         // Bind our server to the agreed upon port number.
00279         memset(&localAddr,0,sizeof(localAddr));
00280         localAddr.sin_port = htons((short) port);
00281         localAddr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00282 bind:
00283         ret = bind(os, (struct sockaddr *) &localAddr, sizeof(localAddr));
00284         if(ret == -1)
00285         {
00286           rlwthread_sleep(1000);
00287           goto bind;
00288         }
00289         // Prepare to accept client connections.  Allow up to 5 pending 
00290         // connections.                                            
00291         ret = listen(os, 5);
00292         if(ret == -1) return LISTEN_ERR;
00293       }
00294       first = 0;
00295 
00296       // accept connections
00297       s = accept(os, (struct sockaddr *) &sockaddr[0], &socklen);
00298       if(s == -1) return ACCEPT_ERR;
00299     }
00300     else if(rl_ipversion == 6)
00301     {
00302 #ifdef AF_INET6_IS_AVAILABLE
00303       if(first == 1)
00304       {
00305         memset(&hints0,0,sizeof(hints0));
00306         hints0.ai_flags = AI_PASSIVE;
00307         //hints0.ai_family = AF_UNSPEC;
00308         hints0.ai_family = AF_INET6;
00309         hints0.ai_socktype = SOCK_STREAM;
00310         sprintf(portstr,"%d",port);
00311         //::printf("server getaddrinfo(%s,%s)\n", adr, portstr);
00312         n = getaddrinfo(adr, portstr, &hints0, &res);
00313         if(n != 0)
00314         {
00315 #ifndef RLWIN32
00316           ::printf("rlSocket:tcp_listen error for %s port=%s : %s\n", adr, portstr, gai_strerror(n));
00317 #endif
00318           return -1;
00319         }
00320         //::printf("done\n");
00321         ressave = res;
00322 bindv6:
00323         do
00324         {
00325           os = socket(res->ai_family, res->ai_socktype, res->ai_protocol);
00326           if(os < 0)                                            continue; // error, try next one
00327 #ifdef __VMS
00328           option = 1;
00329           if(setsockopt(os,SOL_SOCKET,SO_KEEPALIVE,&option,sizeof(option)) < 0)
00330           {
00331             return SETSOCKOPT_ERR;
00332           }
00333 #endif
00334           option = 1;
00335 #ifdef RLWIN32
00336           setsockopt(os,SOL_SOCKET,SO_REUSEADDR,(const char *) &option,sizeof(option));
00337 #else
00338           setsockopt(os,SOL_SOCKET,SO_REUSEADDR,&option,sizeof(option));
00339 #endif
00340           if(bind(os, res->ai_addr, res->ai_addrlen) == 0)      break;    // success
00341           s = os;
00342           disconnect();                                                   // bind error, close and try next one
00343         }
00344         while((res = res->ai_next) != NULL);
00345         if(res == NULL)                                                   // errno from final socket() or bind()
00346         {
00347           ::printf("warning: could not bind to port=%d\n", port);
00348           rlwthread_sleep(1000);
00349           goto bindv6;
00350         }
00351         // Prepare to accept client connections.  Allow up to 5 pending 
00352         // connections
00353         ret = listen(os, 5);
00354         freeaddrinfo(ressave);
00355         if(ret == -1) return LISTEN_ERR;
00356       }
00357       first = 0;
00358       // accept connections
00359       s = accept(os, (struct sockaddr *) &sockaddr[0], &socklen);
00360       if(s == -1) return ACCEPT_ERR;
00361 #else
00362       ::printf("rlSocket:ERROR IPV6 not available on this platform\n");
00363 #endif
00364     }
00365     else
00366     {
00367       ::printf("rlSocket:ERROR: rl_ipversion=%d not known\n", rl_ipversion);
00368     }
00369   } // end active == 0 
00370   else if(active == 1)
00371   {
00372     disconnect();
00373     //::printf("debug: adr=%s port=%d\n",adr,port);
00374     s = -1;
00375     if(rl_ipversion == 4)
00376     {
00377       os = socket(AF_INET,SOCK_STREAM,0);
00378       if(os == -1) return SOCKET_ERR;
00379       s = os;
00380 
00381       //::printf("debug: gethostbyname\n");
00382       // fill destblk structure 
00383       host = gethostbyname(adr);
00384       if(host == NULL)
00385       {
00386         // See if the host is specified in "dot address" form
00387         RemoteIpAddress.s_addr = inet_addr(adr);
00388         if(RemoteIpAddress.s_addr == INADDR_NONE)
00389         {
00390           s = -1;
00391           return INET_ADDR_ERR; // -1
00392         }
00393       }
00394       else
00395       {
00396         memcpy(&RemoteIpAddress,host->h_addr,host->h_length);
00397       }
00398 
00399       memset(&remoteAddr,0,sizeof(remoteAddr));
00400       remoteAddr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00401       remoteAddr.sin_port = htons((short) port);
00402       remoteAddr.sin_addr = RemoteIpAddress;
00403 
00404       //::printf("debug: connect\n");
00405       ret = ::connect(s, (struct sockaddr *) &remoteAddr, sizeof(remoteAddr));
00406       //::printf("debug: connect ret=%d\n",ret);
00407       if(ret == -1) 
00408       {
00409         s = -1;
00410         return CONNECT_ERR;
00411       }
00412     }
00413     else if(rl_ipversion == 6)
00414     {
00415 #ifdef AF_INET6_IS_AVAILABLE
00416       sprintf(portstr,"%d",port);
00417       memset(&hints1, 0, sizeof(hints1));
00418       hints1.ai_family = AF_UNSPEC;
00419       hints1.ai_socktype = SOCK_STREAM;
00420       n = getaddrinfo(adr, portstr, &hints1, &res);
00421       if(n != 0)
00422       {
00423 #ifndef RLWIN32
00424         ::printf("rlSocket:tcp_connect error for %s port=%s : %s\n", adr, portstr, gai_strerror(n));
00425 #endif
00426         return -1;
00427       }
00428       ressave = res;
00429       do
00430       {
00431         s = socket(res->ai_family, res->ai_socktype, res->ai_protocol);
00432         if(s < 0)                                            continue; // ignore this one
00433         if(::connect(s, res->ai_addr, res->ai_addrlen) == 0) break;    // success
00434         disconnect();                                                  // ignore this one
00435       }
00436       while((res = res->ai_next) != NULL);
00437       if(res == NULL) ::printf("rlSocket:tcp_connect error for %s port=%s\n", adr, portstr);
00438       freeaddrinfo(ressave);
00439 #else
00440       ::printf("rlSocket:ERROR IPV6 not available on this platform\n");
00441 #endif
00442     }
00443     else
00444     {
00445       ::printf("rlSocket:ERROR: rl_ipversion=%d not known\n", rl_ipversion);
00446     }
00447   }
00448   return s;
00449 }
00450 
00451 int rlSocket::disconnect()
00452 {
00453   if(s != -1)
00454   {
00455 #ifdef RLWIN32
00456     closesocket(s);
00457 #else
00458     close(s);
00459 #endif
00460   }
00461   s = -1;
00462   return 0;
00463 }
00464 
00465 int rlSocket::isConnected()
00466 {
00467   if(s == -1) return 0;
00468   return 1;
00469 }
00470 
00471 int rlSocket::select(int timeout)
00472 {
00473   struct timeval timout;
00474   fd_set wset,rset,eset;
00475   int    ret,maxfdp1;
00476 
00477   if(timeout == 0) return 1;
00478   /* setup sockets to read */
00479   maxfdp1 = s+1;
00480   FD_ZERO(&rset);
00481   FD_SET (s,&rset);
00482   FD_ZERO(&wset);
00483   FD_ZERO(&eset);
00484   timout.tv_sec  =  timeout / 1000;
00485   timout.tv_usec = (timeout % 1000) * 1000;
00486 
00487   ret = ::select(maxfdp1,&rset,&wset,&eset,&timout);
00488   if(ret == 0) return 0; /* timeout */
00489   return 1;
00490 }
00491 
00492 int rlSocket::printf(const char *format, ...)
00493 {
00494   int ret;
00495   char message[rl_PRINTF_LENGTH]; // should be big enough
00496 
00497   va_list ap;
00498   va_start(ap,format);
00499   ret = rlvsnprintf(message, rl_PRINTF_LENGTH - 1, format, ap);
00500   va_end(ap);
00501   if(ret < 0) return ret;
00502   return write(message,strlen(message));
00503 }

00510 int rlSocket::setIPVersion(int version)
00511 {
00512   if(version == 6) rl_ipversion = 6;
00513   else             rl_ipversion = 4;
00514   return rl_ipversion;
00515 }
